text: The 2005–06 season was the 49th season in RK Zamet’s history. It is their 5th successive season in the Dukat 1.HRL, and 29th successive top tier season. ==Competitions== ===Overall=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"| Competition
